Smart Oven: Develop an oven that can detect the type of food placed inside and automatically adjust cooking settings for optimal results. This oven would have a built-in food recognition system using computer vision and machine learning algorithms. Confidence Score: 0.8

Portable Oven: Create a compact, portable oven that can be powered by a battery or a USB connection. This oven would be ideal for camping, picnics, or for people who live in small apartments. Confidence Score: 0.7

Air Fryer Oven: Design an oven that uses hot air circulation and a non-stick coating to cook food without adding oil. This oven would be a healthier alternative to deep-frying and would also be easy to clean. Confidence Score: 0.8

Sous Vide Oven: Develop an oven that can maintain a precise temperature and allow for slow cooking of food. This oven would be ideal for cooking tender and evenly cooked meats, and would also help to preserve nutrients. Confidence Score: 0.9

Multi-Functional Oven: Create an oven that can perform multiple functions, such as cooking, baking, broiling, and toasting. This oven would be a versatile addition to any kitchen and would help to reduce clutter by eliminating the need for multiple appliances. Confidence Score: 0.9
